_sText:
Hello.

This is a remaster of my friends 3 year old map from 2017. My friend used prefabs he downloaded randomly, and he lost the folder of them all. If you are one of the prefab creators, contact me at discord (northh#2552) and we can discuss something if you are unhappy with the uncredited usage of your prefab.

Anyway, this map features:
  • Zones
  • Forests, hills & lakes
  • Weapons
  • A loot crate
  • Houses & landmarks
  • A "church"
  • And some radios that I don't remember placing.

HOW TO PLAY

  1.  Gather some people and boot up the map.
  2.  Set mp_limitteams to 0 and mp_autoteambalance to 0 aswell.
  3.  Get everyone to join the same team, Terrorists or Counter Terrorists, doesn't matter.
  4.  (OPTIONAL) Set cl_drawhud to 0 for fun.


Special thanks to LeTexPro for making the original br_hills, and thanks to my friends for playtesting the map.
